examples: You are underestimating the power of the human spirit to overcome difficulties.
Estás subestimando el poder del espíritu humano para superar las dificultades.
Yoga is meant to unite the body, mind and spirit.
El yoga está destinado a unir el cuerpo, la mente y el espíritu.
They were all in good spirits as they set out.
Todos estaban de buen humor cuando partieron.
